label: 家司
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Also read Kashi. Private officials of the families of Imperial Princes (Shinnō ), Regents (Sesshō ), Civil Dictators (Kampaku ), and all others of the Third Rank (Sam-mi) and above.Their duties were to issue all kinds of family documents, draw up registers of family property, troops, servants, farmers, etc. [親王、摂政、関白、三位]
